snippet.title: ibb and obb - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
ibb and obb is a cooperative puzzle platformer that allows players to journey through a world with two directions of gravity. 
The game will be released on Playstation Network first and later on PC through Steam. 

We're in the final stages of development and aim to launch s̶e̶c̶o̶n̶d̶  fourth quarter 2012.

Design: Sparpweed
Code: Codeglue
Music: Kettel

If you'd like to find out more or follow the development check:
- Website (http://www.ibbandobb.com)
- Twitter (@ibbandobb, https://twitter.com/#!/ibbandobb)
- Facebook (http://www.facebook.com/pages/Ibb-and-Obb/145236605511337)
